about_the_game:
THE GALAXY'S FAVOURITE SPORT

ZONERS is a super high speed, 1vs1 ball sport game that combines elements of air hockey, soccer & fighting games to create a heart pounding, exciting experience everytime!

Players must use everything at their disposal, including shooting their opponent with projectiles or unleashing crazy special moves to knock a ball in the opponents goal from their side of the court. With each character bringing their own wildly different moves, spins and stats to the field, and stages featuring mad gameplay altering gimmicks like portals and ghostly hands, each match brings the hype.

FEATURES

  • Diverse, weird and wonderful cast of characters unlike any you've played as before

  • Shared simple inputs with wildly different stats, skills & spin types butts up against intense speeds and quick decision making

  • 11 playable stages each with unique hazards, or play hazardless for that competitive edge

  • Utterly unreal original soundtrack featuring: Bruises, CRYSTALBOY, Funk Fiction, Paris Stalker, RoBKTA, Shadow Mantra Steve, Vector U & ViRiX Dreamcore

  • See each character's personalities and desires clash in the Arcade style ZONERS Cup mode and make each of their wishes come true. Featuring 4 increasingly tough ranks that add extra stages and even a Boss battle!

  • Visit the museum gift shop (no MTX) to unlock additional character colours, stages, free play bonus games, game modes, character endings and music

  • Enjoy the lovingly crafted vibes in the ZONERS HQ, with the menus built into the world itself and soak in the style and atmosphere or chat to staff

  • Create and save your own custom rulesets and load them up whenever!

  • A wealth of hassle free, profile based accessibility options that can be accessed in any mode and will continue to grow with feedback



THIS GAME IS IN EARLY ACCESS. PLEASE READ THE EARLY ACCESS SECTION NEAR THE TOP OF THE PAGE SO YOU CAN MAKE AN INFORMED DECISION ABOUT YOUR PURCHASE

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 LTS
  • Processor: 1.02 Ghz
  • Memory: 768 MB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Proven to also work on Steam Deck

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.16 and above
  • Processor: 1.02 Ghz
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Will not work on 64bit only Macs!

name: ZONERS

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista and above
  • Processor: 1.02 ghz
  • Memory: 200 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 768mb video memory
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: An unusual cast of queer & quirky aliens battle it out in the galaxy's favourite sport using their signature skills & traits. Featuring an incredible soundtrack, unique stage gimmicks, custom match settings, bonus games, tons of unlocks & insanely detailed pixel art, it's time to get into the zone!
